title: Ecolab Watermark™ 2025 Study Finds Smarter Water Use Key to India's AI Future
description: Mumbai (Maharashtra) [India], January 13: Ecolab, a global sustainability leader in water solutions and services, today announced the India findings from its third annual Ecolab Watermark™ Study, which explores how people perceive water challenges and the role of business in solving them. This year's research connects water stewardship to one of the region's fastest-growing industries, artificial intelligence (AI), revealing that while India leads global optimism on the promise of AI, awareness of its hidden water impact remains limited.

title: Apple and Google join hands to fix Siri; Gemini to get integrated in Apple products
description: Apple has entered into a multi-year partnership with Google to integrate Gemini artificial intelligence models into its ecosystem

title: UK Govt to criminalise creation of nude deepfakes
description: LONDON, Jan 13: The UK Government will launch criminal prosecutions for the creation of intimate images online without the user’s consent, UK Secretary of State for Science, Innovation and Technology Liz Kendall said. On Monday, British media regulator Ofcom launched an investigation into xAI and Elon Musk’s chatbot Grok, which were used to generate pornographic images using artificial intelligence. If a violation is found, Ofcom could impose a fine equal to 10 percent of the company’s global revenue. “Under the […]

title: AI already does up to 40% of tech work, humans still needed
description: Artificial intelligence is already performing 20-40% of tech work in India, though human intervention remains crucial for quality. By 2027, human-AI collaboration will be central to roles, shifting focus from execution to outcome delivery. Hiring is increasingly skills-based, emphasizing hybrid and multidisciplinary capabilities.
content:

title: Elon Musk says you may never need retirement savings - If AI delivers the abundant future he says is coming
description: Elon Musk says advances in artificial intelligence and robotics could make retirement savings unnecessary, replace most jobs, and create a future of universal high income, near-free goods and services, and abundance that reshapes how people live and work.

title: Opinion | A.I. Is Real. But OpenAI Might Still Fail.
description: Artificial intelligence’s promise is real. But some of the most prominent A.I. companies might not make it.
content: Wall Street fears it has an artificial intelligence problem. A.I.-related stocks are up so much that a fall feels inevitable, particularly if A.I. appears unlikely to live up to its hype. This is the wrong worry; A.I.’s promise is real. The big quest... [2610 chars]

title: Canada’s universities embracing the tech
description: Once considered a concerning new tool that could compromise academic integrity at universities, artificial intelligence is now being embraced by many post-secondary educators who say the technology can enhance learning outcomes if used properly.

title: Alphabet’s rise to $4-trillion market cap cements status as AI trade winner
description: Alphabet Inc. broke above a $4 trillion market capitalisation on Monday, becoming one of the few companies to ever cross the threshold as investors increasingly see the Google parent as one of the biggest winners of the artificial intelligence boom.
